00017 // Primitive Declarations
00018 class COREDLL Primitive : public ReferenceCounted {
00019 public:
00020         // Primitive Interface
00021         virtual ~Primitive();
00022         virtual BBox WorldBound() const = 0;
00023         virtual bool CanIntersect() const;
00024         virtual bool Intersect(const Ray &r,
00025                 Intersection *in) const = 0;
00026         virtual bool IntersectP(const Ray &r) const = 0;
00027         virtual void
00028                 Refine(vector<Reference<Primitive> > &refined) const;
00029         void FullyRefine(vector<Reference<Primitive> > &refined)
00030         const;
00031         virtual const AreaLight *GetAreaLight() const = 0;
00032         virtual BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dg,
00033                 const Transform &WorldToObject) const = 0;
00034 };
00035 struct COREDLL Intersection {
00036         // Intersection Public Methods
00037         Intersection() { primitive = NULL; }
00038         BSDF *GetBSDF(const RayDifferential &ray) const;
00039         Spectrum Le(const Vector &wo) const;
00040         DifferentialGeometry dg;
00041         const Primitive *primitive;
00042         Transform WorldToObject;
00043 };
00044 class COREDLL GeometricPrimitive : public Primitive {
00045 public:
00046         // GeometricPrimitive Public Methods
00047         bool CanIntersect() const;
00048         void Refine(vector<Reference<Primitive> > &refined) const;
00049         virtual BBox WorldBound() const;
00050         virtual bool Intersect(const Ray &r,
00051                                Intersection *isect) const;
00052         virtual bool IntersectP(const Ray &r) const;
00053         GeometricPrimitive(const Reference<Shape> &s,
00054                            const Reference<Material> &m,
00055                            AreaLight *a);
00056         const AreaLight *GetAreaLight() const;
00057         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dg,
00058                       const Transform &WorldToObject) const;
00059 private:
00060         // GeometricPrimitive Private Data
00061         Reference<Shape> shape;
00062         Reference<Material> material;
00063         AreaLight *areaLight;
00064 };
00065 class COREDLL InstancePrimitive : public Primitive {
00066 public:
00067         // InstancePrimitive Public Methods
00068         InstancePrimitive(Reference<Primitive> &i,
00069                           const Transform &i2w) {
00070                 instance = i;
00071                 InstanceToWorld = i2w;
00072                 WorldToInstance = i2w.GetInverse();
00073         }
00074         bool Intersect(const Ray &r, Intersection *in) const;
00075         bool IntersectP(const Ray &r) const;
00076         const AreaLight *GetAreaLight() const { return NULL; }
00077         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dg,
00078                       const Transform &WorldToObject) const {
00079                 return NULL;
00080         }
00081         BBox WorldBound() const {
00082                 return InstanceToWorld(instance->WorldBound());
00083         }
00084 private:
00085         // InstancePrimitive Private Data
00086         Reference<Primitive> instance;
00087         Transform InstanceToWorld, WorldToInstance;
00088 };
00089 class COREDLL Aggregate : public Primitive {
00090 public:
00091         // Aggregate Public Methods
00092         const AreaLight *GetAreaLight() const;
00093         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dg,
00094                       const Transform &) const;
00095 };
